recommendations.title: Data Scientist Intern (College Student Only)
responsibilities: Extract, collect and prepare data for analysis
Develop suitable analysis or model to meet business goals.
Automate solutions to support future usage by non-technical users
requirements: Have finished minimum 6 semesters in any Information Technology field
Understand Analytical mind and great business sense
Placement in our office in South Jakarta (WFO 4 days and WFH 1 day)

recommendations.title: Data Scientist
responsibilities: Able to develop systems and tools to collect, clean, and distribute data from various separate sources
Able to conduct statistical data analysis and compile reports and visualizations to understand trends and patterns
Mastering predictive modeling techniques, statistical methods, and data analysis to gain insight from trends and data patterns
requirements: S1 graduates, prioritized from the Department of Statistics, Mathematics, Information Engineering, or Information Systems
Minimum 1 year work experience is preferred; open to fresh graduates
Have high motivation and positive personality
Discipline, fast learning, integrity, has a spirit of leadership, as well as the ability to think analytically and good conceptual

recommendations.title: Data Scientist
responsibilities: Gather data from various sources, including primary and secondary sources
Identify patterns, trends, and anomalies in data
Build machine learning or statistical models to make predictions or classifications
Assess the performance of models using metrics like accuracy, precision, recall, and F1-score
Clean and organize data into a format that can be analyzed
Create tables, graphs, and other visualizations to help understand data
Create systems and algorithms to automate processes
requirements: Experience applying data mining and information retrieval techniques to extract significant insights
